item.title: Conductors
item.description: I don’t know much about orchestra and conducting, however I sang in a boy’s choir when I was a child and since then I have admiration for orchestras and I like classical music. This is Georges Prêtre conducting the Vienna New Year’s Concert in 2010. I like how he is enjoying the music and sometimes is not conducting at all but only listening. Then, watch the end, Prêtre being 85 years old, he can still explode!

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact me via e-mail at vdq *ät* mailbox.org To send me encrypted mails, find my public key here. You can find me on Github

item.title: Blog init
item.description: You are reading the first post of my blog. It is still in experimental stage. Let’s see where this is heading!

item.title: About
item.description: This is a personal blog. It is built with Hugo using Cactus Theme, I replaced the cactus image and favicon with my bonsai tree.
